mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, name, code, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, company_id, transporter_id, driver_id, insurance_start_date, insurance_end_date, attachment_id_3, tax_start_date, tax_end_date, attachment_id_4, check_start_date, check_end_date, attachment_id_5,register_no,driver_id
mapper.update: update t_car set driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},update_date = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update t_car set driver_id = '',update_date = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.data_status, a.desp, a.name, a.code, a.attachment_id_1, a.attachment_id_2,a.company_id,a.transporter_id, a.driver_id, a.insurance_start_date, a.insurance_end_date, a.attachment_id_3, a.tax_start_date, a.tax_end_date, a.attachment_id_4, a.check_start_date, a.check_end_date, a.attachment_id_5,a.register_no, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',b.attachment_link) as attachment_id_1_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',c.attachment_link) as attachment_id_2_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',d.attachment_link) as attachment_id_3_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',e.attachment_link) as attachment_id_4_link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.api.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',f.attachment_link) as attachment_id_5_link from t_car a left join t_attachment b on a.attachment_id_1 = b.id left join t_attachment c on a.attachment_id_2 = c.id left join t_attachment d on a.attachment_id_3 = d.id left join t_attachment e on a.attachment_id_4 = e.id left join t_attachment f on a.attachment_id_5 = f.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update t_car set data_status = ${@com.iflytransporter.common.enums.Status@Status_Invalid} ,update_date = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_car (id, update_date, desp, name, code, attachment_id_1, attachment_id_2, company_id, transporter_id, driver_id, insurance_start_date, insurance_end_date, attachment_id_3, tax_start_date, tax_end_date, attachment_id_4, check_start_date, check_end_date, attachment_id_5,register_no) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{insuranceEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{attachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{taxEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{attachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{checkEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{attachmentId5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{registerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
